Articles.Content:
so everyone knows about the star systems mod by now right?, well heres my challenge, in that mod take some krags planet factory planets or something and put them around the other stars, then i challenge you, to build a ship that will get you to both stars, onto at least 1 planet in each system, with only 2 detachable (and redockable) components, and ALL STOCK MUAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA, not only that but you have to return back to kerbin with at least a 2 part chunk of ship remaining(hello, scott manley, are you there?).

have fun

TLDR: build a stock ship that can make it to 2 stars and onto one planet in each starsystem, then return home in a lander stage or bigger

its possible, ive done it

So prove it.

If this was a Wikipedia page it'd be locked by now, I suggest you try again, and please read the challenge guidelines

Closing!
